thread.title: Sheikh Mohammed announces Dh1 million job
thread.title_full: Sheikh Mohammed announces Dh1 million job

title: Sheikh Mohammed announces Dh1 million job
text: Sheikh Mohammed announces Dh1 million job Web Team   | Last updated on February 28, 2017 at 02.23 pm Share More > Vote The job is open to all Arabs in the Arab nations, and anyone between the age of 5 to 95 years can apply. His Highness Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, Vice President and Prime Minister of UAE and Ruler of Dubai, has posted a vacancy on his Twitter account with a 'reward' of Dh1 million.The job is open to all Arabs in the Arab nations, and anyone between the age of 5 to 95 years can apply. Below is a verbatim translation of the Twitter post: We are advertising the desire to welcome nominations for those who have these desired key points, qualifications, experience and skills: Experienced and good with dealing with people. Has at least once had the experience in humanitarian, volunteering or charity work where people satisfaction and happiness was the end goal. Has a good reputation and standing with references that he is of good moral substance in his character and standing in society. That he is positive and believes in the abilities of people around him within his team and within the Arab nations. That this person is of the age between 5 - 95 years of age. This is open for all Arabs in the Arab nations. There will be a reward of a million dirham. Find out more details from Ahmed Alshuqary You can nominate yourself or others can nominate you or companies can also nominate. Nomination can be sent to www.arabhopemakers,com And while you apply for this dream job listed by Sheikh Mohammed, you may also explore other job opportunities in the UAE by clicking here . With inputs from Maan Jalal Share
